title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development (Street
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development (Street 

Furniture Fees) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation the Planning 

and Development Regulations 2001 to 2021. 

Amendment of Part 1 of Schedule 12 to the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development (street furniture fees) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2021 amendment part 1 schedule 12 principal regulation

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 2. For the period up to and including 31 December 2021, Part 1 of Schedule
text_raw:
2. For the period up to and including 31 December 2021, Part 1 of Schedule 
12 of the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001) is 
amended by the substitution in Column 2 – Licence Fee, of – 

“€0 per table” for “€125 per table” 

opposite the mention in Column 1 – Appliance, Apparatus or Structure, 
of – 

“(h) Tables and chairs outside a hotel, restaurant, public house or other 
establishment where food is sold for consumption on the 
premises”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [209] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 April, 2021. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [209]
